Articles.Content: Just wanted to report this bug. I'm not sure what causes it, but it's been happening every time I try and fly. It appears that after staging, specifically after rapidly staging due to a failure of somekind, the camera is not focusing on the controlled vehicle. I've tried to hit home to recenter the camera, but it focuses off of the main part. I'm not sure what is going on. I'm going to try and uninstall and reinstall the game to see if that fixes it, but this is  very frustrating.
